ConfigItem.Name: TypeBasedPriorityEscalation
ConfigItem.Description: This configuration defines a list of ticket types to which the priority based escalation should be restricted. Only tickets with a ticket type of this list will get checked for priority based escalation. All tickets will escalate priority based if this configuration is deactivated or has no types configured.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###900-EscalationStopEvents
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket event module that triggers the escalation stop events.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::EventModulePost###900-EscalationIndex
ConfigItem.Description: Updates the ticket escalation index after a ticket attribute got updated.

ConfigItem.Name: FirstResponseDecisionBase
ConfigItem.Description: This configuration defines if the first response time should be calculated based on the first owner change or the first agent response.

ConfigItem.Name: EscalationOrder
ConfigItem.Description: This configuration defines in which order escalations should get checked and if configured applied to the ticket. Possible options are: SLA, Type, Priority and Queue. This configuration is key sensetive.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::CustomModule###001-Znuny4OTRSTypePriorityBasedEscalation
ConfigItem.Description: This configuration registers a custom ticket module that overloads (redefines) existing functions in Kernel::System::Ticket to provide the Znuny4OTRS-TypePriorityBasedEscalation functionality.
